survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate employee satisfaction with workplace air quality and identify areas for improvement to enhance health and productivity.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the air quality in your primary workplace?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for better granularity. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the air quality in your primary workplace?

questions.question_text: Which of the following air quality issues have you experienced in your workplace? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option if additional issues are anticipated.

script.question_text: Which of the following air quality issues have you experienced in your workplace? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How often do you experience discomfort due to air quality in your workplace?
questions.client_notes: Use a frequency scale for measurable insights.

script.question_text: How often do you experience discomfort due to air quality in your workplace?

questions.question_text: Does poor air quality affect your productivity at work?
questions.client_notes: Use a 4-point scale to capture nuances.

script.question_text: Does poor air quality affect your productivity at work?

questions.question_text: What measures, if any, has your workplace taken to improve air quality?
answer_options: None that I am aware of
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option for additional measures.

script.question_text: What measures, if any, has your workplace taken to improve air quality?
answer_options: None that I am aware of

questions.question_text: How would you rate the effectiveness of the air quality measures implemented in your workplace?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected any option other than 'None that I am aware of' in Q5
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale with an additional 'Not applicable' option.

script.question_text: How would you rate the effectiveness of the air quality measures implemented in your workplace?
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected any option other than 'None that I am aware of' in Q5

questions.question_text: Do you believe your workplace prioritizes air quality as part of employee well-being?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for clarity.

script.question_text: Do you believe your workplace prioritizes air quality as part of employee well-being?

questions.question_text: Would you be willing to participate in initiatives to improve workplace air quality (e.g., feedback sessions, pilot programs)?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to gauge willingness.

script.question_text: Would you be willing to participate in initiatives to improve workplace air quality (e.g., feedback sessions, pilot programs)?

questions.question_text: What additional measures would you suggest to improve air quality in your workplace?
questions.client_notes: Allow open-ended responses to capture diverse suggestions.

script.question_text: What additional measures would you suggest to improve air quality in your workplace?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your workplace to others based on air quality alone?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your workplace to others based on air quality alone?
